title: ASP.NET 5 TempData Extension Library
description: This package add the data type compatibility for ASP.NET 5 TempData feature.

packOptions.summary: Using AddEnhancedTempData method to enhance TempData support in your ASP.NET 5 web application. This module will replace the default SessionStateTempDataProvider, and more data type now can be stored into TempData dictionary.
